body.name: VASAGLE Bookcase, 5-Tier Bookshelf, Display Shelf and Room Divider, Freestanding Decorative Storage Shelving, Rustic Brown ULBC62BX, 27.6”L x 9.4”W x 62.6”H (70 x 24 x 159 cm)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 44 mins
features: [Roomy, Practical, Decorative] Whether needing space for toy storage, book organization, or trinkets display, our 5-tier storage shelf is just the piece you need
[More Secure] Other freestanding office cabinets and storage shelves tend to tip and wobble, this bookcase has anti-tip kit to keep it safely in place
[Professional Finish] All edges have been smoothly sealed and each unit comes with caps that conceal screw hardware, thus presenting a freestanding storage unit that is safe, worry-free, and stylish

[A Stage for All] Family photos, ornaments, and your potted string of pearls—offer them a stage to shine with this 9.4” x 27.6” x 62.6” bookshelf; what about more decorations? No problem, sturdiness is the essence of it—each shelf can hold up to 33 lb
[Easy Assembly] With included labeled parts and clear instructions for a sensible assembly process, you’ll set up this free-standing bookcase easily in your study, living room, or bedroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits small spaces well!
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for something that's sturdy, functional, and visually appealing without taking up a bunch of space, this is a versatile option. It's fantastic for small living rooms and entryways where all you have to work with is a corner. It does not wobble or anything when you walk past it. Took all of 20 minutes to put together. Painfully easy to build. My only gripe is the wood-colored stickers that you cover the hardware with after building SUCK. They don't stick well and they're not exactly the same finish. This is a very minor thing, but I'm pretty happy with this product overall. It's structurally sound, the material feels high quality, and it is dumb easy to assemble. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Put a Spin On It!
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that the product was very easy to assemble, it is sturdy, I love the color it matches my current color scheme, looks great in the living room, but what I truly loved about it was I was able to lay it on its side & display all my beautiful plants, that's my spin on it!! I would recommend this product!!🥳

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased three shelves and couldn't be happier. Assembly was time-consuming, but using an impact drill made it faster. The small floor feet were a bit difficult to put in and prone to bending, but they didn't affect the shelf's stability.These shelves are incredibly sturdy and of high quality. They span approximately 83 inches when three are put together, providing ample space for decoration or organization. I can't wait to decorate them!In conclusion, these shelves are a fantastic purchase. Despite a minor issue with the floor feet, they are strong and well-made. If you're looking for reliable, stylish shelves, I highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and has lots of room
reviews.reviewText: I love the way it looks, adding a unique and modern look to the place while still being subtle. It holds all my books and I use the little side shelf spots to put plants.It has to be on very flat hard ground all the way against the wall (no trim) though because it's a bit top heavy and ours has a bit of a lean to it (probably user error). It's on carpet against a wall that has a trim so it doesn't have the wall to stabilize it and it leans away from the wall a bit. We had to put all our heaviest stuff on the bottom and push it towards the back to make it more secure. Just keep that in mind and maybe find a way to secure it to the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really good value for the money. Pieces are solid, assembly is straightforward. They even throw in a couple of extra pieces of assembly hardware.I would strongly suggest that you attach it to the wall, simply because of the height to depth ratio (not a product flaw, simply based on the measurements).The only gripe I have is that the stickers used to cover up the screws are all one pattern, so they don't always blend in well (not an issue for me, as most of them are covered by books or items). Having light, medium and dark ones to choose from to match the wood would bump my rating up to 6 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with my purchase! This bookshelf was packaged very well, and is easy enough to assemble. It’s very unique, and I love how it looks in my room. It also seems to be sturdy, and able to hold a good amount of weight. The only down side was the stickers that are supplied to cover the screws aren’t the best, and don’t stick completely down (which is very minor and doesn’t bother me). I definitely will be purchasing another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price....except the screw covers
reviews.reviewText: Got this on sale for $68 so I bought two. Easy to assemble (if you pay close attention to the images in the instructions) and a good quality for the price. Nothing sags or warps. Seems solid. I plan to "float" these on my wall for a unique look but they're fine on the ground too. They do come out of the package with some kind of fiberglass type material on them but another reviewer had mentioned that so I was prepared with some wetipes and it was no issue to get it off before handling. It was the worst on the top board but not too bad on the rest. I will say that the screw caps that came with this are kind of pathetic. They are black, for one thing, which makes them stand out pretty bad on my brown bookshelf. But they are also very shallow so I you happen to sink the screw in a hair too much while assembling, they will not stick. This was easily resolved by purchasing some wood grain colored stickers on Amazon for $5. One package was enough to do both shelves and it looks about as good as it possibly can. I'll include photos of the shelf without any caps on (screws exposed), with the black caps that are provided with the kit and finally with the stickers that I purchased on this site. They are nice, thick stickers that seem durable.Here's the link for them...https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B07737SBP9?psc=1&ref=ppx_pop_mob_b_asin_title

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These shelves have a modern clean look. They appear sturdy, would definitely advise anchoring if you have children in the house as young children may think they are for climbing, All parts are clearly marked . Each size screws are marked in their own package, no measuring or guessing. I highly recommend this brand. The furniture is sturdy, attractive, goes together nicely looks better than things that cost far more in furniture stores. As a nearly 70 year old woman with arthritis I can assemble these on my own with the included Allen wrench and screwdriver.

Tiene un diseño increíble, fácil de armar, en verdad realmente, es muy sencillo con pasos que te dejan en claro como ir armando a detalle toso el mueble, por lo que su precio es por completo válido. 🥰
These shelves are beautiful, well made, and easy to assemble. I ordered two and joined them together and they look great and provide so much shelf space. Love them.

I was a bit nervous purchasing a bookshelf like this off of Amazon but figured I would give it a shot...this one was a bit less expensive than most other products I had seen in stores/online, had good reviews, and was a decent price in my mind....and I absolutely love it! It's the perfect size and the grey/beige color works well to match most furniture and decor in a room. It definitely took a bit but was relatively straightforward to assemble - no different than a classic Ikea product haha!I used is as my "nerd shelf" in a small wall of my family room and it's been a massive hit with anyone whose seen it. My husband and I did anchor it into the wall with the provided accessories to ensure that it doesn't fall by accident, which I do recommend to anyone else considering this product. The size and dimensions are good enough to store most standard books and decor/accessories. I loved the idea of placing 2 of these next to each other to create a wider stacked look and totally would have done it myself had I had the wall space for it! It looks funky and abstract and totally adds a unique look to our house!

Bought two of these for symmetry on either side of our tv. They arrived on time and were extremely well-packed, so no scratches or dents. They are exactly what I expected in terms of looks and size, and I am very pleased with the look. They are also very sturdy and easy to assemble. I would recommend these.
